short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Comms X to call numbers in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Comms X to call numbers in Chrome.

Comms X is a Unified Communications desktop and mobile application designed to
enhance the communicating capabilities of employees within organisations.

Appropriately termed "the future of communication", Comms X can be used as a
softphone or integrated with your Voice Over IP handset to simplify and streamline
communications for individual workers and entire enterprises. 

Features include: incoming and outgoing calls, video calls, instant messaging,
conferencing, group chat, call monitoring, and much more.

This extension allows Comms X users to click-to-dial telephone numbers within
Google Chrome.
